node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `krut_tomb` ( `krut_tomb_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type_nodetype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(240) DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `killa_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reputation` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`krut_tomb_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: krut_tomb
